Verses: 1 naangal Alangaththaik Kattugira Seydhiyai Sanpallaadh Kettapodhu, Avan Kobiththu, Erichchaladaindhu, Yoodharai Sakkandhampanni:

2 andha Arpamaana Yoodhar Seygiradhu Enna, Avargalukku Idankodukkappadumo, Paliyiduvaargalo, Orunaalile Mudiththuppoduvaargalo, Sutteriththup Podappattu Manmedugalaana Karkalukku Uyir Koduppaargalo, Endru Than Sagodhararukkum Samaariyaavin Senaikkum Munbaaga Sonnaan.
3 appozhudhu Ammoniyanaagiya Thobiyaa Avan Pakkaththil Nindru: Avargal Kattinaalum Enna, Oru Nari Eripponaal Avargaludaiya Kal Madhil Idindhupogum Endraan.
4 engal Dhevane, Naangal Avamadhikkappadugiradhaik Kettu, Avargal Nindhikkira Nindhaiyai Avargal Thalaiyinmel Thiruppi, Avargalai Siraiyiruppin Dhesaththile Sooraikku Oppukkodum.
5 avargal Akkiramaththai Moodippodaadheyum; Avargal Paavam Umakku Munbaagak Kolaikkappadaadhiruppadhaaga; Kattugiravargalukku Manamadivundaagap Pesinaargale.
6 naangal Alangaththaik Kattivandhom; Alangamellaam Paadhimattum Ondraai Inaindhu Uyarndhadhu; Janangal Velaiseygiradharku Aavalaayirundhaargal.

7 erusalemin Alangaththaik Kattugira Velai Valarndherugiradhu Endrum Idikkappatta Idangal Adaipattuvarugiradhu Endrum Sanpallaaththum, Thobiyaavum, Arabiyarum, Ammoniyarum, Asthoththiyarum Kettapodhu, Avargal Migavum Erichchalaagi,
8 erusaleminmel Yuththampanna Ellaarum Egamaai Varavum Velaiyaith Thadukkavum Kattuppaadu Panninaargal.
9 aanaalum Naangal Engal Dhevanai Nokki Jebampanni, Avargal Nimiththam Iravumpagalum Jaamankaakkiravargalai Vaiththom.
10 appozhudhu Yoodhaa Manidhar: Sumaikaararin Belan Kuraindhupogiradhu, Manmedu Michchamaayirukkiradhu; Naangal Alangaththaik Kattak Koodaadhu Endraargal.
11 engal Saththurukkalovendraal: Naangal Avargal Naduve Vandhu, Avargalaik Kondrupodumattum, Avargal Adhai Ariyaamalum Paaraamalum Irukkavendum; Ivvidhamaai Andha Velaiyai Oyappannuvom Endraargal.
12 adhai Avargalandaiyile Kudiyirukkira Yoodharum, Pala Idangalilumirundhu Engalidaththukku Vandhu, Paththuvisai Engalukku Sonnaargal.
13 appozhudhu Naan Alangaththukkup Pinnaaga Irukkira Pallamaana Idangalilum Medugalilum Pattayangalaiyum, Eettigalaiyum, Villugalaiyum Pidiththirukkira Janangalaik Kudumban Kudumbamaaga Niruththinen.

14 adhai Naan Paarththu Ezhumbi, Prabukkalaiyum Adhigaarigalaiyum Matra Janangalaiyum Nokki: Avargalukku Bayappadaadhirungal; Neengal Magaththuvamum Bayangaramumaana Aandavarai Ninaiththu, Ungal Sagodhararukkaagavum, Ungal Kumaararukkaagavum, Ungal Kumaaraththigalukkaagavum, Ungal Manaivigalukkaagavum, Ungal Veedugalukkaagavum Yuththampannungal Endren.

15 engalukku Seydhi Theriyavandhadhendrum, Dhevan Avargal Aalosanaiyai Abaththamaakkinaarendrum, Engal Pagaignar Kettapodhu, Naangal Ellorum Avaravar Thangal Velaiyai Seyya Alangaththukkuth Thirumbinom.

16 andru Mudharkondu En Velaikkaararil Paadhipper Velaiseydhaargal, Paadhipper Eettigalaiyum Parisaigalaiyum Villugalaiyum Kavasangalaiyum Pidiththu Nindraargal; Adhigaarigal Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Ellaarukkum Pinnaaga Nindraargal.
17 alangaththile Kattugiravargalum, Sumaisumakkiravargalum, Sumaiyetrugiravargalum, Avaravar Oru Kaiyinaale Velaiseydhu, Marukaiyinaale Aayudham Thariththirundhaargal.
18 kattugiravargal Avaravar Thangal Pattayaththaith Thangal Iduppile Kattikkondavargalaai Velaiseydhaargal; Ekkaalam Oodhugiravan Ennandaiyile Nindraan.
19 naan Prabukkalaiyum Adhigaarigalaiyum Matra Janangalaiyum Nokki: Velai Peridhum Visthaaramumaayirukkiradhu; Naam Alangaththinmel Sidharappattu Oruvarukku Oruvar Dhooramaayirukkirom.
20 neengal Evvidaththile Ekkaala Saththaththaik Ketkireergalo Avvidaththile Vandhu, Engalode Koodungal; Nammudaiya Dhevan Namakkaaga Yuththampannuvaar Endren.
21 ippadiye Naangal Velaiseydhukondirundhom; Avargalile Paadhipper Kizhakku Velukkum Neramudhal Natchaththirangal Kaanumattum Eettigalaip Pidiththirundhaargal.
22 akkaalaththile Naan Janangalaip Paarththu: Raamaaru Namakkuk Kaavalukkum Pagalmaaru Velaikkum Udhava, Avaravar Thangal Velaikkaararodunkooda Erusalemukkulle Raaththangakkadavargal Endru Solli,

23 naanaagilum, En Sagodhararaagilum, En Velaikkaararaagilum, Ennaip Pinpatri Kaavalkaakkira Sevagaraagilum Engal Vasthirangalaik Kalaindhupodaadhirundhom; Avaravarukku Aayudhamum Thanneerum Irundhadhu.
